import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import { Dropdown } from "react-bootstrap"; import {Modal, Row, Form, Button, Badge} from 'react-bootstrap' import { FaPlusCircle } from "react-icons/fa"; import { FaArrowCircleRight } from "react-icons/fa"; import api from "../../services/api"; import './modalStyle.css' export default function ModalPizzas(){ const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [saboresList, setSaboresList] = useState([]) const [saboresCliente, setSaboresCliente] = useState([]) const handleClose = () => setShow(false) const handleShow = () => setShow(true) useEffect(() => { api.get('/pizzas') .then(({ data }) => { setSaboresList(data) }) }) const selecionarSabor = (atual) => { saboresCliente.push(atual) console.log(saboresCliente) } x return( <> Escolha o sabor da pizza:

Quantidade de saboresList na pizza:

 Escolha o sabor {saboresList.map((item) => { const {sabor} = item return( {selecionarSabor(sabor)}}> {sabor} ) })} {saboresCliente.map((item) => { return( {item} ) })}

Deseja borda recheada?

 Escolha o sabor Nutella Catupry Cheddar Parmesão {/* Calabresa Calabresa Calabresa */} ) }
